summary:
Are you looking for a simple home ? Don\'t like dark or huge houses?
Amazing Caves is a simple home near Riverwood with something convenient.
?????????????????????????????????????????????????
descriptionHtml:
Are you looking for a simple home ? Don\'t like dark or huge houses?
Amazing Caves is a simple home near Riverwood with something convenient.

In Version 1.4, there are 3 Buttons to change sex for NPC at out door, select Beef(Male), Rose(Female) or Voiceless(no NPCs) and wait for a while for \"Welcome\" (reset NPC gender representation).

With Amazing Caves you have:
Bathroom : Everybody must take off all their clothes , remember to equip them when you are going to leave the bathroom. :D

Farm : Dog, Cow, Chicken, Potato, Leek, Cabbage, Cluster, Wheat, Nirnroot/Red, Cheese, egg ...

Parterre : Butterfly, Bee, Dragonfly, Firefly... and all kind of floras that I can find.

Campfire : It\'s party time during 20:00 to 24:00. :D

Store : You can sale stolen goods here.

CraftingBase : Sky Forge, Smelter, Sharpening Wheel, ArmorWorkbench, Tanning Rack, Alchemy/EnchantingWorkbench and Wood Chopping Block.

Storage : 24 x Mannequins, 24 x WeaponRacks, 38 x WeaponRackCOAs and 6 x DisplayCases.

Resident: Farmer, Miner, Bard, and some NPCs copied from the game. They are living, working, Training and have parties when night falls.

Others : 30 x Beds for 60 x NPCs, all Shrines, all Doomstones, all kind of mine, pool and fishs, one Waterfall, your private bed and there must be...your private throne! :P

????? Warning ADULT Content ?????

Don\'t download and use this optional file if you have issues with slavery, BDSM or violence.

With Version 1.3, I have added an optional file:AmazingCavesAdult.esp for some adult elements about slavery and  violence, it is just a concept of trying to use only the modules within the game for create an adult-like atmosphere.

Play with AmazingCavesAdult , you\'ll get slaves,  ShackleWall, MetalCage, altar and other special things.

Only oblations can be killed and get filled SoulGem, HumanHeart, DaedraHeart, Ectoplasm, BriarHeart, FireSalts, FrostSalts, VoidSalts, WispWrappings, PearlSmall, Pearl, FavorThadgeirAshes, glowDust, BoneMeal (random).

Oblation stone can help you to reset the oblations.

Humanoid Throne is the favorite set for me, hope you will like it. ;)

If you only want to watch slaves, please download AmazingCavesAdult Version 1.4.1 and there are 2 Buttons to change sex for NPC at outdoor and to control slaves. Remember to do \"Voiceless\" first.

?????Warning ADULT Content?????

####### Credits #######

If you would like to play with General Stores, please download my optional file AmazingCavesGS

General Stores?http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18340

####################

Miscellaneous : ScriptSource for anyone that who want to know how the script runs.

If you know about optimization or easier way for script and have any proposal for mods, be sure let me know please, but I can just speak a little bit English, because I\'m a Taiwanese, so you know... :P

======= Updata Note =======
Version 1.4
Add 3 Buttons to change sex for NPC at outdoor
Add DWE Technology: Mysterious piston(Show only):P

Version 1.3
Add a Bookshelf
Adjust the position of the Campfire
Beautify the entrance, more obvious and momentum

Version 1.2
Fix some Navmesh
change packages for Miner and Farmer
New lanterns at the out door
Some visual modification

Version 1.1
Player will unequip all items in the bathroom but not in the pool.
Companion will not lose all their items after bathe.
Changed some light effects to avoid shadow bug.
